#summary The homepage of php-lod software package, offering RESTful web services including: [#phpCsv2Rdf],[#phpJson2Rdf], and [#phpSparqlExplorer]

= Introduction =
This page describes a set of tools that provide online services for linking open data.

 * the source of this package can be found at http://code.google.com/p/lod-apps/source/browse/#svn/trunk/php-lod

= Software Package =

|| *class*  || *type* || *status*  || *dependency* ||
|| phpWebUtil || api  || alpha  ||  ||
|| phpRdfNode || api  || alpha  || phpWebUtil ||
|| phpRdfStream || api  || alpha || phpRdfNode, phpWebUtil ||
|| [#phpCsv2Rdf] || service|| alpha  || phpRdfStream, phpRdfNode, phpWebUtil ||
|| [#phpJson2Rdf] || service|| alpha  || phpRdfStream, phpRdfNode, phpWebUtil ||
|| [#phpSparqlExplorer] || service|| alpha  || phpWebUtil ||

== phpCsv2Rdf ==
Convert online CSV data into RDF, N-Triples or N-Quads.

 * This service is in testing status, please report errors/requests at http://code.google.com/p/lod-apps/issues
 * An instance of this service is available at http://onto.rpi.edu/php-lod/phpCsv2Rdf.php. 

== phpJson2Rdf ==
Convert online JSON data into RDF, N-Triples or N-Quads.

 * This service is in testing status, please report errors/requests at http://code.google.com/p/lod-apps/issues
 * An instance of this service is available at http://onto.rpi.edu/php-lod/phpJson2Rdf.php. 
 * A demo of this service is available at http://onto.rpi.edu/php-lod/demo/face_lod.html

Here is an example conversion configuration file (in JSON)
<pre>
{
"ns_property":"http://lod-apps.googlecode.com/files/face.rdf#",
"propmap":{
  "picture":{"v":"http://opengraphprotocol.org/schema/image"},
  "name":{"v":"http://opengraphprotocol.org/schema/title"},
  "link":{"v":"http://opengraphprotocol.org/schema/url"},
  "category":{"v":"http://opengraphprotocol.org/schema/type"}

  "pictureX":{"v":"http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/depiction"},
  "nameX":{"v":"http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/name"},
  "linkX":{"v":"http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/homepage"}
  "categoryX":{"v":"http://purl.org/dc/terms/type"},
  
  "first_name":{"v":"http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/firstName"},
  "last_name":{"v":"http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/lastName"},
  "from":{"v":"http://purl.org/dc/terms/source"},
  "id":{"v":"http://purl.org/dc/terms/identifier"},
  "created_time":{"v":"http://purl.org/dc/terms/created"},
  "updated_time":{"v":"http://purl.org/dc/terms/modified"},

},
"namespacemap":[
  {"prefix":"og","ns":"http://opengraphprotocol.org/schema/"}
  {"prefix":"foaf","ns":"http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"}
  {"prefix":"dcterms","ns":"http://purl.org/dc/terms/"}
]
}
</pre>

==phpSparqlExplorer==
A simple SPARQL endpoint explorer to navigate URI space and retrieve descriptions of and reference to the URI. It also allow users to check sources of triples. 
 * This service is in testing status, please report errors/requests at http://code.google.com/p/lod-apps/issues
 * An instance of this service is available at http://onto.rpi.edu/php-lod/phpSparqlExplorer.php.
